page.title: 09John Francome
page.content: John Francome is a well-known jockey. He has now retired.The last two weeks before he retired,he did not like riding and couldn't wait for the retiring day to come.Before that he loved riding,but wasn't so keen on the travelling.His plans are to be a trainer and have about forty horses.He does not think he will miss riding very much.He has been a jockey foe fifteen years.He has ridden 4,600 racesand has won 1,138.He said that he hopes to have many winners.The oldest horse he has ridden was fifteen years of age.He has lived in Lambourn for sixteen years.He has some pets,but they are mostly his wife,Miriam's.She has a pet chicken called Hazel.It comes to her when she calls.The favourite horse he has ridden is 'Sea a Bridge'.He started riding when he was six years old.
